headline: Teledyne Fuel Cell Successfully Launched on Blue Origin’s New Shepard
summary: HUNT VALLEY, Md., September 18, 2025--Teledyne Energy Systems, Inc., a subsidiary of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), launched its Hydrogen Electrical Power System (HEPS) fuel cell aboard Blue Origin’s New Shepard rocket through NASA’s Tipping Point opportunity. Launched successfully on August 23, this flight advances fuel cell technology for future lunar and deep space missions.

Launched successfully on August 23, this flight advances fuel cell technology for future lunar and deep space missions.

headline: Teledyne Technologies Inc. (TDY) Unveils Skycarrier Drone Launch Pad
summary: Teledyne Technologies Inc. (NYSE:TDY) is one of the best lidar stocks to buy right now. On September 9, the company’s defense unit, Teledyne FLIR Defense, unveiled its Skycarrier autonomous drone launch and recovery platform at the DSEI defense exhibition in London. The system is designed to enable the autonomous deployment of quadcopter drones from moving […]

headline: Axon's Connected Devices Unit Gains Momentum: Can It Sustain?
summary: AXON's Connected Devices revenues jump 28.6% in Q2 2025, fueled by TASER 10 adoption and strong body camera demand.

headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Opens New Office in Arlington, Virginia
summary: WASHINGTON, September 18, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense held an opening event yesterday for its new office in the Crystal City area of Arlington, Virginia, minutes from the Pentagon.
